mapper.select: select stype,count(1) num from ( select case length(student_number) when 8 then 'benke' else 'yanjiusheng' end as stype from (select distinct party_member_id,dpm.student_number from debrief_evaluate_result der left join debrief_party_member dpm on dpm.id = der.party_member_id where der.`college_id` = #{collegeId}) subq ) subq group by stype
select count(1) from (select distinct commenter_id from debrief_evaluate_result where `college_id` = #{collegeId}) subq
